Articles.Content:
I'm fairly new and have loved playing still completly hooked, but please do something about flying kerbals in space. its just imposible . making docking a fairly pointless exercise as I cant transfer kerbals from one ship to another. i' m either missing something obviouse or this function just isn't fit for purpose.

please do something so that I don't have to mess about with mods.

best game since swg ;-)

its fully possible, it takes some practice.

Try pressing 'R' to activate their jetpacks.
I think what he is saying is that docking to transfer Kerbals is pointless because even when docked you still have to transfer by EVA.

Use more ladders.

Handholds are a more efficient way of moving your Kerbalnaut around in freefall. Something we learned the hard way on Gemini IV.

Admittedly, it would be a lot easier if you could transfer crew through docking ports.

Transferring Kerbals thru docking ports would be great, hope this feature is added someday.

I like the idea of using ladders to crawl from one ship to another, I should try that.

Reason for docking: You can transfer fuel, so expendable tankers are useful for fueling long duration missions. I have a "robotanker" I use for this.

Reason #2: Can be useful for transferring Kerbals via EVA, at least the ships don't wander or separate. One less thing to worry about during the transfer EVA.
